snippet.title: Alex's Solitude Trailer
snippet.description:
Alex's Solitude is one of the two stories included in our upcoming visual/kinetic novel Alex's Hope & Alex's Solitude. Find it on Steam now at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2537750/Alexs_Hope__Alexs_Solitude/

And on itch.io at: https://violethorizons.itch.io/alexs-hope-alexs-solitude

Learn more about Violet Horizons and how Alex's Hope ties in to our next game, Alex's Journey to the Grave, on our website: https://violethorizons.com/
